name: PC1Dmod
short_description:
PC1Dmod is an updated version of the popular solar cell simulation tool PC1D:

https://sourceforge.net/projects/pc1d/

PC1Dmod6.1 extends PC1D by (i) including Fermi–Dirac statistics, which can be relevant in regions of high doping, and (ii) adding advanced c-Si models for Auger recombination, band-gap narrowing, carrier mobility, band structure and more.

The executables, documentation and references can can be downloaded from PV Lighthouse:

http://www.pvlighthouse.com.au/

Author: Halvard Haug
Institute for Energy Technology, 
Kjeller, Norway
summary: PC1Dmod is an updated version of the solar cell simulator PC1D
